summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Center Department; adopting a fee schedule from which the Director is authorized to set fees for 2009 and 2010; adopting policies for use of Seattle Center facilities; amending Sections 17.16.010 and 17.16.015 of the Seattle Municipal Code; repealing Ordinance 119199 and Ordinance 117695 in connection therewith; and adding a new Section 17.16.020 to the Seattle Municipal Code.
